newsitem.title: USA: U.S. stock index futures return to tiny gains late.
newsitem.headline: U.S. stock index futures return to tiny gains late.

text.p: June 10 - U.S. stock index futures returned to tiny gains late after downticking as T-bond futures closed soft. June S&P 500s tested the 863.00 area before recovering. Weakness in NASDAQ issues, airline stocks added weight. Some brokers looked for the contract to stay firm yet into Tuesday's close but said it was unlikely to stage a retest of all-time peaks today.
